verbs.description: Saudi Arabia [V: may] announce a huge investment in U.S. infrastructure to coincide with President Donald Trump 's visit to the kingdom next week .
[ARG0: Saudi Arabia] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: announce] [ARG1: a huge investment in U.S. infrastructure] [ARGM-PRP: to coincide with President Donald Trump 's visit to the kingdom next week] .
Saudi Arabia may announce a huge investment in U.S. infrastructure to [V: coincide] [ARG2: with President Donald Trump 's visit to the kingdom next week] .
